title: Antifouling performance against SiO2 particulate matter adhesion of Cyclo Olefin Polymer nanopillar surfaces
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Zihao Zhao, Nan Liang, Tomohiro Shimizu, Shoso Shingubara, Takeshi Ito
The global challenge of soil-derived fine particles, mainly composed of silicon dioxide (SiO2) and recognized as particulate matter (PM), presents a significant environmental and economic issue, notably contributing to air...
